name: FindEdu Website
desc: I developed the backend of this project using Node.js and Express.js.  FindEdu is a web platform that helps users easily search for and explore various educational centers they are interested in. Visitors can  browse through institutions, read detailed information about their programs, and make informed decisions about their education  options.  The backend ensures secure and efficient data handling, allowing for smooth communication between the client interface and the  server. It also supports features like search, filtering, and detailed data retrieval to provide a seamless user experience

name: Nasiya.Uz Website
desc: I developed the backend of this project using NestJS, Prisma, and PostgreSQL. Nasiya.uz is a powerful web application designed for large companies, supermarkets, and similar businesses to efficiently manage and track debts and financial flows. One of its key features is the ability to record and monitor who owes whom â€” whether it's clients, partners, or suppliers. The system clearly displays payables and receivables in real time.
